abstract: A company spokesman said the resignations were not related to a recent punishment over mislabeled pork at 13 Wal-Mart stores.
snippet: A company spokesman said the resignations were not related to a recent punishment over mislabeled pork at 13 Wal-Mart stores.
lead_paragraph: HONG KONG — Wal-Mart announced on Monday morning the resignation of two top executives in China, just a week after the government of the largest city in western China ordered the closing of all 13 Wal-Mart stores there for 15 days as punishment for a series of food handling and mislabeling violations.

headline.main: Two Top Executives Resign From Wal-Mart China
headline.print_headline: Two Top Executives Resign From Posts At Wal-Mart China
